title: Google Pixel Watch 41mm Smartwatch with WiFi, GPS, BT and Heart Rate Monitor in Bulk Packaging (Hazel)
description: MIX AND MATCH, WEAR YOUR WATCH IN STYLEFully customize your watch, mix and match the band color and watch head to choose your favorite watch combo! Express Yourself with a Unique Google Pixel Smartwatch, Personalized By You to Match Your Mood Anywhere!Select the band style with the watch head you like and digitally customize your watch face for a custom style anytime. Swapping out the band is quick and easy, so you can rock your favorite watch band for any occasion. Google's Pixel Smartwatch is more than just a timepiece; it's a sophisticated, feature-rich smartwatch designed to enhance your daily life. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast, a busy professional, or someone who loves staying connected, Google's Pixel Smartwatch offers the perfect combination of technology and style. Stay connected and productive wherever you go; respond to messages, manage your inbox, and make calls right from your wrist. Stay on top of activity, calories burned with activity tracking, track your heart rate and get insight into your sleep. Make every moment count with the ultimate smart companion on your wrist.What's in the box?Google Pixel Watch Head in the color of your choosing - in title aboveThe Watch Band style and color of your choosing - shown in photo aboveMagnetic Charging Cable USB-CQuick Start Guide
